DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective trial compare survival patient metastatic malignant melanoma treat Taxoprexin Injection treat Dacarbazine . In addition , response rate drug , response duration , time progression time treatment failure measure . Toxicity evaluate compare two group .
DOC.brief_title: Study Taxoprexin Injection vs. Dacarbazine Patients With Metastatic Malignant Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Patients must malignant melanoma , document metastatic disease . Patients must least one unidimensionally measurable lesion . Patients must receive prior systemic chemotherapy metastatic disease . Prior treatment immunotherapy vaccine therapy allow provide documentation disease progression . At least 6 week ( 42 day ) since prior immunotherapy , cytokine , biologic , vaccine therapy unless patient progressed immunotherapy . At least 4 week ( 28 day ) since prior radiotherapy . Lesions use assess disease status may radiate . Patients must ECOG performance status 0 2 . Patients must > = 18 year age . Patients must adequate renal liver function Patients must adequate bone marrow function . Life expectancy least 3 month . Patients must sign informed consent form indicate aware investigational nature study keep policy institution . Patients receive prior therapy taxane dacarbazine . Patients whose primary site eye . Patients past current history neoplasm entry diagnosis , except curatively treat nonmelanoma skin cancer carcinoma situ cervix cancer cure surgery alone diseasefree survival longer 5 year . Patients uncontrolled brain metastasis . Patients pregnant nursing patient practice acceptable method birth control . Patients may breastfeed study . Patients current active infection require antiinfectious treatment ( e.g. , antibiotic , antiviral , antifungal ) . Patients current peripheral neuropathy etiology great grade 1 . Patients unstable serious concurrent medical condition exclude . Patients know hypersensitivity Cremophor . Patients must recent major surgery within past 14 day large field radiation therapy , chemotherapy , endocrine therapy last 28 day , biologic therapy last 42 day .
